summary: This document is an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Paul Morris regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. Lesley Groff informs Paul Morris that Epstein needs to reschedule their appointment, suggesting a new date for the meeting.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is communicating with Paul Morris about scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank and is involved in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual whose meeting with Paul Morris is being rescheduled by Lesley Groff.

connections.description: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is scheduled to meet with Jeffrey Epstein for a discussion related to business matters.
Lesley Groff is acting on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein to manage his appointments.

events.title: Rescheduled Meeting
events.description: A meeting between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein is rescheduled to January 22, 2013.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein.
The original appointment was canceled by Lesley Groff.
The rescheduled meeting is proposed for January 22, 2013, at 4:30 or 5:00 PM.
